title: Black Tuesday
creator_credit: Australian Broadcasting Commission and W. Batty
brief_description: A report on the disastrous bushfires on the outskirts of Hobart on the 7th of February, 1967. Shows scenes during the fires, the damage caused, and interviews with people involved. The temporary housing and rehabilitation of homeless fire victims is described.
description: A report on the disastrous bushfires on the outskirts of Hobart on the 7th of February, 1967. Shows scenes during the fires, the damage caused, and interviews with people involved. The temporary housing and rehabilitation of homeless fire victims is described.
